attributes.action: Considering the example of other Covid-19 affected countries, open the gyms
attributes.additional_details: By following the rules and exampleS of the other countries who have already opened their gyms, such as Bulgaria and Czechia, the UK government can try to open the bigger gyms such as “Puregym” and “The Gym”, where people will be able to practice social distancing.
attributes.background: It is already scientifically proven that having a healthy lifestyle makes your chances of getting the virus lower and lower. Nowadays there are thousands of people across UK, who have a healthy life because of their passion to go to the gym. This activity also provides some mental health benefits.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government announced that gyms could reopen subject to social distancing restrictions from 25 July:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-gyms-and-pools-to-reopen-safely
